==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ま|だん|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
From [[魔]] ([[ま]], ''[[ma]]'') meaning "[[demon]]" or "evil spirit [[influence]]" + [[弾]] ([[たま]], ''[[tama]]'') meaning "[[bullet]]".

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|まだん|kyu=魔彈}}

# [[magic bullet]]

====Derived terms====
* [[w:ja:魔弾の射手|魔弾の射手 (まだんのしゃしゅ, madan no shashu)]], the Japanese name for the German opera "[[w:en:Der Freischütz|Der Freischütz]]". Literally meaning "the [[shooter]] of the magic bullets".
